A functional picture frame that can be used as a makeshift magnifying glass for reading or examining small details.
A creative frame for holding small trinkets, charms, or even coins, turning a simple picture frame into a decorative treasure chest.
A frame designed to hold multiple photos or art pieces, creating a dynamic and visually engaging display.
A frame that can be easily disassembled and reassembled in different configurations, allowing for flexibility in space and design.
A picture frame made of repurposed materials, such as reclaimed wood or upcycled metal, giving it a unique and eco-friendly appeal.
